name: Urban Impact Recycling Ltd.
overview:
Urban Impact Recycling Ltd. specializes in recycling, secure shredding, and waste audit services.

We offer a comprehensive paper recycling service for leading commercial, municipal, institutional, and government organizations.

A family-owned and operated business, we are committed to environmental conservation and global responsibility. Today, Urban Impact services 4500 locations, from Whistler to Chilliwack. A family-owned and operated business, we are committed to environmental conservation and global responsibility. Urban Impact specializes in recycling, secure shredding, and waste audit services. We offer a comprehensive paper recycling service for leading commercial, municipal, institutional, and government organizations.

Urban Impact operates a carefully monitored fleet of 32 collection trucks with processing and sorting capacity. Customer service is recognized as a key management priority everywhere within Urban Impact. Our collection truck drivers who service our accounts are seen as key client service personnel.

external_links.title: Nicole Stefenelli, Winner, Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year, Cleantech
